attributes.action: Introduce a total ban on all non commercial fishing/angling in 5 years time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Imagine England as the first country in the world without Angling.
We all know it would benefit everyone,the fish in the short term and in particular the nature lovers of today plus future generations.
Put simply we request a set date in the future 5 years from now at which point Angling will be banned.
Lets end this outdated and pointless "Hobby" and put an end to the unneccessary anquish and suffering caused to our wildlife.
We should be the first in the world to achieve this and start today,lets send this barbaric activity the way of fox hunting and become a better country.
